## StyleSet type

An array of \[\[StyleSelector\]\]s that are used together to define how a \[\[DataSource\]\] should be rendered. `StyleSet`<!-- -->s are applied to sources providing vector tiles via their method `setStyleSet`<!-- -->. This is also handle internally when a whole theme is passed to a \[\[MapView\]\] via `mapview.theme`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StyleSet = StyleDeclaration[];
```
